data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yoshino, Hiroki, Watabe, Hikari, Ohsawa, Takeshi A. (2017): A new species of seagrass-boring Limnoria (Limnoriidae, Isopoda, Crustacea) from Japan. Zootaxa 4232 (2): 251-259, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4232.2.8|7 occurrences
